result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an uaċtaráin john f kennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.html: thart fán am ar thit túr eile an lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bpennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bpennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc

result.html: is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
